alert.note: Alert for Breckinridge; Hardin; Meade (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 9:19PM EDT until June 25 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Meade County in central Kentucky... Northwestern Hardin County in central Kentucky... Northeastern Breckinridge County in central Kentucky... * Until 1000 PM EDT/900 PM CDT/. * At 919 PM EDT/819 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles north of Hardinsburg, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Radcliff, Webster, Vine Grove, Irvington, Muldraugh, Ekron, Guston, Mystic, Raymond and Frymire. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT/1000 PM CDT/ for south central Indiana...and central Kentucky. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT/1000 PM CDT/ for south central Indiana...and central Kentucky.
